Or am I completely wrong?

item.title: Python Rectangular Prism Volume Finder
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I’ve been getting into Python lately, so I wrote this, as it’s slightly more interesting than a hello world.

#! /usr/bin/env python
def main():
	print("Welcome to Cube Volume Finder.")
	Width = getIntInput("Width> ")
	Height = getIntInput("Height> ")
	Depth = getIntInput("Depth> ")
	Volume = Width * Height * Depth
	print("Volume of the cube is: " + str(Volume))
def getIntInput(prompt):
	theInput = raw_input(prompt)
	if(isNumber(theInput)):
		return int(theInput)
	else:
		print "Invalid number: " + theInput
		return getIntInput(prompt)
def isNumber(n):
	import re
	if re.match("^[-+]?[0-9]+$", n):
		return True
	return False
main()

Any tips or mistakes I might have made? Thanks.

Read full topic
